page.title: 10Alison's Friday 1.25_10.00
page.content: The{afternoon}lessons begin with geography and history, where lately we have been working on this{Domesday Project. During the project we have visited several farms, villages and interviewed people in the area. The last lesson on a friday is Maths where we work from text books, solve problems and do topics. My school day ends at 3.35 when I catch the schoolbus back to Ashcott and I arrive home at 4.00. At 5.00, after having an early tea, I go to Pedwell and work at the Kamine kennels for 3 hours, until 8.00. When I get home I watch television and do a bit of{homework until about 10.00 when I go to bed. This shows a little of my{home life and schooling in 1985
